description:
An American cowboy who is the self-proclaimed "Master of Lottery Vending Machines".
He held Anya hostage and challenged Rio to a game, only to lose when he later challenges to a drinking contest with a hot drink. He is later revealed to be one of Cartia`s henchmen when he was given back his pistol by the latter, and later returns at the Sky Resort to carry out Cartia`s plan.
name: Bull Hard
